generatedPrompts.backCover: A simple and elegant back cover design that provides a peaceful conclusion. Against a soft coral pastel background, a single, whimsically illustrated dumbbell sits on the left side of the card. A lone, colorful resistance band is draped artistically over the dumbbell, echoing the workout theme from the front cover in a quiet, minimalist way. The style is clean and flat 2D, using the same color palette of teal, coral, and sunny yellow. The bottom-right corner is intentionally left completely blank and undecorated, with the design elements focused on the center-left. The overall feel is serene and subtly humorous, providing a gentle end to the card's story.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A humorous and vibrant flat 2D illustration for a birthday card. The scene depicts a group of diverse, stylized cartoon friends having a disastrous but funny attempt at a group workout. Characters, inspired by the reference, are in funny, exaggerated poses of effort and slight clumsiness, wearing mismatched, brightly colored retro workout gear. One character is comically tangled in a resistance band, another is struggling to lift a tiny dumbbell, and a third is attempting a yoga pose but has tipped over. The background is a simple, modern gym setting in soft pastel colors like teal, coral, and sunny yellow. In the center, the text "Happy Birthday!" is written in a beautiful, clearly readable, and flowing handwritten cursive script. The art style is clean, with bold lines and a playful, lighthearted feel. All key elements and faces are safely positioned away from the edges.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided multiple reference photos as input images. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in these reference photos with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

create a card that includes all the people

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An artistic and unexpected full-bleed illustration for the left interior of a greeting card. The scene is a beautifully rendered, close-up, top-down view of a vintage record player turntable. The record on the platter has a custom label that, instead of a song title, features a stylized illustration of a creaking, rusty hinge with comical musical notes floating up from it. The color palette is a sophisticated mix of the card's primary colors: teal, coral, and warm yellow, with elegant black and silver details on the turntable. The style is flat 2D with a slightly textured, screen-printed look, creating a smart and witty visual pun on the idea of 'old sounds'. The mood is playful and clever, maintaining visual harmony with the overall card.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautifully designed page featuring a handwritten message in the center, framed by artistic and humorous decorative elements. The text "Happy birthday! I was going to get you one of those cards that makes a sound, but I figured you hear enough creaking and groaning from your own joints already. Hope you have a fantastic day!" is written in an elegant, legible, and flowing handwritten cursive script with a natural pen-ink feel. The message is framed by whimsical, stylized illustrations of sound waves emanating from illustrated cartoon joints – a knee and an elbow – complete with comical 'creak,' 'groan,' and 'pop!' sound effect words integrated into the sound wave lines. The color scheme is consistent with the rest of the card (teal, coral, yellow), creating a sophisticated yet funny design. The entire composition is balanced and artistically frames the heartfelt, humorous message.
